name: Log your iOS location in Airtable
description:
Every time you enter/leave a circle specified in your Make iOS app, it will be logged in Airtable. You can use Airtable's [mapblock](https://support.airtable.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013405108-Map-block) to visualize your locations.
The Airtable used in this scenario has the following columns: Created, Circle, Latitude, Longitude, Entered, Left, Location. Without them, it will not be possible to succesfully finish building the scenario.
